name: Island fight
description:
Island fight is a local multiplayer/splitscreen game.

On Island fight you fight your firends or family over 2 Islands.

Both players have 10 in healt and you have to defeat the other player before the other player kills you. BUT how do you aim? Well u dont becouse it shoots automaticly at the player when u press the shoot button.

CONTROLS:

Green player:

Move: arrowkeys

Shoot: Right CTRL

Blue player:

Move: WASD

Shoot: E
